speaker: Speaker_A
text: So welcome . The first kick-off meeting . What shall we do ? First the opening , then the rest . What are we going to do . We m have to make a new remote control . It has to be original , trendy and user-friendly .

speaker: Speaker_A
text: So we will get back th on that . First we have to make a functional design . After that we have to make a conceptual design , and then after that a detailed design . So we'll discuss that later .

text: First we have a look at . So first to we have to make a small painting . What have do we have to do . First you can save the documents . We have to do that every time we make something . You can print it . No . And we have to use the pen and the eraser .

text: So Now . We all have to use this one . You have to make your own favourite animal . So I'll make an example . First don't touch that things .

speaker: Speaker_A
text: That's it . So that was two . Now next . The budget . The b Uh we will sell the t at twenty five Euros . And we have only twenty of twelve and a half Euro to make it .

speaker: Speaker_C
text: Uh I will start . Uh Big one , they are uh not easy to use . Um I have one set and uh a remote control , when I dropped it , uh it broke . So that won't be uh our goal , I think . And uh g big buttons , m uh that's easier to use than uh I think .

speaker: Speaker_A
text: Is this positive or negative , that uh big buttons ?

speaker: Speaker_C
text: Big buttons , positive . All all small buttons like when you have uh like a hundred buttons on your remote control , you won't know what they're working for .

speaker: Speaker_B
text: Uh well I think the the the goal of a remote control is that it's it it has an influence on the T_V_ set . And that it controls the channels and the the volume .

speaker: Speaker_B
text: And uh I I I think it's positive if there's a a LED uh uh a LED on the corner of the of the remote . So that you know it s it still has batteries on it in it . And that if you push the button the LED uh gives a light , and uh and you see that it's working .

speaker: Speaker_A
text: So and do they always have that ?

speaker: Speaker_B
text: No no no . But I my my experience is that it it it's convenient to have that . Yeah . Yeah .

speaker: Speaker_D
text: Uh at home we have a T_V_ , a video uh recorder , a D_V_D_ player , and a satellite receiver . We have uh four distinctive remote controls for that . That's not really ea easy . So it would be nice if we have one for all .

speaker: Speaker_D
text: And we also had a remote control for our radio set . But um i it it had a lot of buttons on it , and you didn't know which one was what . And it was uh uh v not easy to use . So we n barely used it .

text: The weight . Not not too heavy .

speaker: Speaker_C
text: Bust-free . That when you drop it , it won't break . Like uh some kind of rubber on it . Or hard uh hard plastic .

text: Uh something like when you uh lose your uh remote control , sometimes it happen . Uh it between the couch and you can't find it . When you push a but a button on the T_V_ , then you hear some uh some sort of bleep . And then you uh , hey there there's remote control .

speaker: Speaker_D
text: Yeah I think it uh from a marketing point of view , it also has to look nice . Or you won't sell it .

text: And um yeah uh on our website we can see what products we already have . And it should work with as many uh as possible of them .
